name: The Offbeat Life - become location
what_you_do: The Offbeat Life podcast focuses on creating partnerships with brands for sponsored content and offers programs to help individuals start and monetize their own podcasts.
who_you_serve: The Offbeat Life serves brands looking for advertising opportunities and individuals interested in podcasting, including entrepreneurs and content creators.
offering: Sponsored podcast episodes, social media promotion, blog posts, email marketing, and access to a large audience.
service_provided: Sponsored Podcast Episodes, Social Media, Blog post, Email Marketing, Speaking Engagements, Webinars
bio: Over 200,000 downloads, audience in 65+ countries, featured in multiple media outlets including Refinery29 and Forbes.
business_focus: The Offbeat Life podcast focuses on creating partnerships with brands for sponsored content and offers programs to help individuals start and monetize their own podcasts. (podcasting)
